description: 'Fourgy':Three new studs, Rod, Bill and Pete, all doing a heavy thing with the model of the year - Jimmy Hughes.  Rod and Bill are both heavy-hung and wild.  Pete, a younger boy, had but one desire and that was to recieve a hard anal attack from Jim.  This movie has some of the most exciting action ever.  There's lots of bare-holed pumping in this sexually charged vignette.  It will leave you wanting the address and room number for that infamous hotel.
title: Fourgy, Scene #04
